snippet.title: Drova: Playable Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Play it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1590900/

The action RPG "Drova" takes you to the rough and dynamically changing world of Draheim. There, the Order enters the territory of a local faction to find Ether and uncover ancient ruins and artifacts. Both sides clash and conflict seems inevitable... 

In this teaser you play as a new member of the Order and your task is to receive a report from Alban. He awaits you in the tavern "To the Headless Ripper" in the Forest of Thara. But the people there are not friendly...

Want to get in contact? Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/FVz8Z4PRkC

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1585180/

Website: https://just2d.com​
Twitter: https://twitter.com/J2D_Interactive

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/just2d_interactive/

itch.io: https://just2d.itch.io/drova
